RISC-V KCI bridge
  • Dependencies

Project dependencies

Services run in Docker containers, so most dependencies will be covered in the images. However, tu run the project locally you'll at least need:

  • Python >= 3.12
  • docker
  • docker compose
  • make
  • poetry >= 2.1.2
  • curl
  • libpq-dev
  • gcc
  • autoconf
  • automake
  • build-essential
  • libtool
  • git
  • libc-dev
